message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $120. I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I can meet you halfway between my initial offer and your counteroffer, so I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $100?
